channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Wow That's Amazing
channel.desc: Get ready for incredible experiments and mind-bending puzzles to impress your friends with Wow That?s Amazing. Owain and Tilly are here to explore epic science tricks to try at home and showcase brand-new technology innovations from around the world! In this episode, find out why you float in the Dead Sea and how to pump up the volume with some DIY speakers, try out a trick to make a playing card using your smartphone, and discover the ways science is helping to save the Great Barrier Reef.
